snippet: While they have repeatedly fired rockets at the airport and carried out a broad campaign of violence across the country, the suicide attacks that have been a hallmark of the war have been less common in the capital.
abstract: Suicide attack on coalition convoy in Kabul kills four people and wounds 35 others, potent reminder of Taliban's capacity to strike Afghanistan's capital.
lead_paragraph: While they have repeatedly fired rockets at the airport and carried out a broad campaign of violence across the country, the suicide attacks that have been a hallmark of the war have been less common in the capital.

headline.main: Taliban Take Responsibility for Bombing in Kabul
headline.print_headline: Taliban Take Responsibility for Bombing in Kabul
